reviews.text: Trop bon
Really poorly prepared, oily tasteless beef, requested medium got well done. Couldn't taste bun, it was full of oil. Fries are ok but fried once.

The food is good but it is not amazing burger .
Personnel 10/10.
Great service! Great food! As always
Great burgers and customer service ill definitely be back when I'm in Brooklyn!

The food is always good but that back alley is a bit rough. I will return first the food and definitely not eat in due to the surrounding area. 3 stars due to that back alley. Avoid the back ally of this Shakeshack.
Good mix of healthy choices.
The food and the service is great thatâ€™s why I keep coming back
omg ciss burger like waoâ¤ï¸â¤ï¸â¤ï¸
I went in to buy their chicken bites and it was perfectly fried. It wasn't dry and overcooked. The breading was crunchy. I'd go back to try their burgers.
Sloppy place sloppy worker's
I was impressed by how clean and organized the restaurant was.
Excelente lugar para visitar , buen precio
The food there is good/decent

First time at this Shake Shack and it was really nice! The workers were cool, I was tryna decide between fries and onion rings, and the woman behind the counter recommended the onion rings. It was a great choice! Super friendly and the food is great ğŸ‘
Great Shake Shack which was located near our hotel for some late night snacks.

What a lovely experience. Will be going back! Ashanna, the host who attended me was very friendly and patient with me in helping me make the perfect selection for me. I tired the strawberry lemonade w/ boba and a shack burger. It was delicious!! Dreaming of one right now ğŸ˜‹
Staff itâ€™s rough
The food is delicious. The wait is not too long.
Beware! I got the veggie burger here and hours later I had terrible food poisoning

Workers  were all nice to me!
The cashier very respected to middle age customer.     Good food!   Expensive,  but nothing  is cheap in Nyc.

What you pay aligns with what you receive. The staff offered remarkable customer care. The food was good but not the best of its kind in our experience. They cook skillfully, serve efficiently, and charge appropriately. This place possesses exceptional qualities.

I  ordered my food at 9:11 , you have people  ordering their food after me  , and getting their food  be4 me , what !!! The  woman  notice that i been there for a min waiting and she try to accommodate me but im  about to be late for work .  Now itâ€™s 9:35 no food !!! I had to ask for a refund   And this is not the first time this happen
Muito bons os hambÃºrgueres
Quiet setting, but the food is too expensive
Not as busy as expected, but counter service was still a bit slow.
Nos encantaron estas hamburguesas
I really love it. Top Service !
Great prices. Tasty, quick meal
Good service, good workers, and the shroom burger is always a hit
Servicio muy Ã¡gil
Rude service.
This is the place to go!!!
I recommend the Shake Shack experience! Richard is a very understanding server, he was very helpful to us and was very friendly. Thank you for thais.
It's always busy at this shake shack.  The burgers are good.

This was my first time coming to this location.  My first order was done online for pick up in store and the first experience was pleasant.  Upon finishing my food, putting my cheese fries in my bag for departure after dining in, I decided to order another burger.  There was a gentleman in front of me ordering and I was next.  When I approached the register with my belongings and shake shack bag in my hand, the flamboyant gentleman at the register between 12:30pm and 1:00pm approached me with unnecessary hostility because he assumed with me having a shake shack bag in my hand, I was coming to "complain".  The fact that I was even approached like that threw me off guard and I told him I didn't come here for any issue, I'm simply trying to order.  I provided three dollar gratuity as a courtesy too.  Nevertheless, I understand in this world you have to be aware and alert, but to deliberately approach someone because of your own assumption is totally unnecessary, wrong and unprofessional.  Work on your skillset and approach on paying customers because what I brushed off, others may not.  Again, my first pick up experience went very well, the second experience was confrontational.  This review is based on my visit July 7th, 2025.

After a long test day I wanted to get me a great burger so I decided to go to shake shake for one and tried their new barbecue bacon burger, which was good. You can never go wrong with shake shack!
Heard so many good reviews about this and tried, the taste was amazing but the fried chicken is bit oily, the store is always crowded, hard to get a seat ğŸ˜

An unexpectedly pleasant and far experience! Order submitted with ease. Coupon code for a free  burger was successful.  Meal was piping hot and fresh.  Milkshake was wonderfully thick and delicious.

Everything was great!

I was surprised by the lack of a lunchtime crowd but realized that local schools were not in session and likely a reason why the place wasn't crowded.

Per essere un fast food la qualitÃ  Ã¨ buona. Forse i chicken bites sono un poâ€™ piccoli di dimensioni e la porzione non Ã¨ molto abbondante ma devo dire che il sapore del fritto e dellâ€™impanatura era molto buono, anche leggermente piccante.

Un endroit pour manger sur le pouce et rapidement. Les burgers sont bons et variÃ©s. Dans la composition vous pouvez choisir des ingrÃ©dients de qualitÃ© comme l'avocat, le bacon, les champignons et sans oublier le steak goÃ»teux ou encore les hot-dogs. Les frites torsadÃ©es sont  bonnes et cuites Ã  point.

Da kann man von US FastFood halten was man will: Es ist einfach ein sensationeller Burger, wobei der mit KÃ¤se gefÃ¼llte Pilz eine Offenbarung ist. .... noch einen winzigen Tick besser als BÃ¼rgermeister, Berlin, Deutschland und eine Reise wert!

The burger tastes great for a fast food smash burger, it is definitely one of the better ones that I have had. The waiting time was however too long. There were people in front of me taking forever to discuss who knows what and there seemed to be only one person taking orders despite some more people around. This could definitely be optimized. There were several lemonades to order from but I received something different than I ordered but it was ok so I didn't care but if you do, make sure that they get you what you ordered.

My pickup order was ready for a long time and no one was giving it to me so I asked for it and the lady said it wasn't ready but it was sitting on the shelf. The worst part was they didn't cook the burger through and it made my stomach hurt. The meat was still raw/pink as you see in the photos. Customer Support was helpful in providing store credit for this awful burger.

The Korean burger was overrated 6.5, it was dry & barely had any Korean sauce or flavor to it, the kimichi.. was coleslaw lettuce ğŸ˜­I expected the same sandwich shown on the menu. The bbq Korean was better, 8.5 the beef patty was super fresh & tasted rly good. The drinks are good depending on what you get like sunset lemonade & yuzu honey lemonade but the dragonfruit lemonade was okay tasted kinda bad like 5.5 mid similar to medicine water. The fries are crunchy and best eaten when hot.

So I had shake shack twice. The first time I tried it, it was honestly good. It was overpriced for my taste but my friend treated me that day. My second time trying it I got two burgers, chicken bites and a drink. The burgers was the $6.99 ones. First of all the whole meal was salty. They probably changed chefs or someone dont know what they were doing. I literally struggled to finish the meal. The chicken bites was salty and small for $5 and change. I was going to take it back to them but I said forget it I don't like conflict. I was even going to give it to a homless man outside because I thought he would enjoy it. This was my second and last time here.

My friend order cheese fries and said it lack salt. The amount of salt I got was probably for his meal

Shake shake has lost its pizazz. There is nothing special about it anymore.  The food isn't that great and just average. The fries taste frozen and the burgers are dry.  No thanks for a $20 burger. ğŸ˜‘

Burger took forever to be prepared although there was literally 7 customers in the whole place. Food came in whatever order. It tasted okay, but not as tasty as it should. It's completely over staff. Workers couldn't care less about customers, they kind of ignore them, they're just chatting and making noise instead of working. Sadly this place does not live up to the standards of Shake Shack!

First time trying Shake Shake and thought their smashed patties burger was super salty. Customer service is terrible here because the cashier is hella rude. In-N-Out in California is so much better in terms of freshness and friendlier customer service. I will not be back at this Shake Shack location when visiting Brooklyn, New York.

Very busy location but got to my desk to find a raw burger. Called them and they did say they would issue a refund however I have to find time to go back after work. Thatâ€™s a food safety issue. Glad I wasnâ€™t a child that just ate the burger without looking.
It's a good place to eat a quick snack. The burgers are juicy as usual.

This place used to be a premium location. Sad to say it has GREATLY fell off. Itâ€™s sad because this was the first location that I ever had shake shack at 12 years ago. My order was absolutely disgusting. The patty was THICK and PINK. No smash style burger should ever look like that. The patty was cold and the bread was cold. It looks like itâ€™s been sitting out for hours. Even the fries were cold and overly salty. I shouldâ€™ve know my experience wasnâ€™t going to end well when the cashier rudely stared at me with a blank face after my wife told her thank you. Truly disappointing and Iâ€™d recommend everyone steer very clear from this location. I still enjoy shake shack at other locations but this experience will make me take a VERY LONG break from shake shack. Thereâ€™s plenty of other great burger locations that can accommodate properly and hire employees with manners

Mega leckere Burger mit Aussicht. Der Laden war mega voll, das Bestellen hatte daher ein bisschen â€Bahnhof-Charakterâ€œ. Leider war es aufgrund des Andrangs auch nicht so sauber. Allerdings fanden wir es besser wie In-N-Out-Burger! Wir probieren vielleicht mal eine andere Filiale.

Canâ€™t go wrong with Shake Shack. The burgers are cooked perfectly and the portions are solid. My go-to is the Avocado Bacon Burger (adding onion, tomato, and lettuce) and they donâ€™t skimp out on the avocado.

I been to this location a few times. Most recently I got some lunch to go. I ordered a chicken sandwich and french fries on the app. It took a few minutes before my food was ready even though it said it would be ready 15 minutes prior to myâ€¦

This shake shack is pretty much 5 mins away from my college so I go there often. I never had any bad experience there. They have friendly customer service and it's busy always . I usually try the cheese fries or bacon cheese fries and the shroom burger! Absolutely love the taste. It's a great place for quick bites. ğŸ‘ŒğŸ¼â€¦

Super slow service; cashiers with attitude fighting with customers over complaints.

The batter on the chicken fell off when I grabbed a piece. Seemed like their frying oil hadn't been changed for a while, so fries looked sad and had a bitter aftertaste.

got the shackburger and smokeshack; beef patty was flavourful and delicious. the peppers in the smokeshack made it unique and had a little spice kick. fries were an interesting crinkle shape but nothing extraordinary. delicious burger franchise, wish we had locations in Toronto!

Die Burger waren gut, aber auch wirklich nicht mehr! FÃ¼r mich waren die Pommes gut, den anderen haben die wellenschnitt Pommes nicht so gut geschmeckt.... Das Burger Fleisch war sehr lecker, die Buns waren auch ok. Es wÃ¤re fÃ¼r mich nichtâ€¦

I've wanted to try Shake Shack for the longest time to see if the hype was real.
Let me tell you I was not disappointedâ€¦

Gold burger, but please improve your waste management! Put in place a compost bin for food, napkins etc., composting is now mandatory in NYC. Also add clear images of what goes in which, else people don't follow and put recycling materials for landfill. I'm sure it'd improve the image of your brand too!
Excellent Cookies and Cream Milkshake. Their Avocado and Bacon Burger was good too. Also, their Hotdog was high-quality and delicious.

Terrible service. Went in and stood at the counter. No one offered to come help or take my order. They had a self service machine on the counter but the shroom burger i wanted wasn't an option. I get that new Yorkers arent the nicest of theâ€¦
Ad ora il miglior hamburger di New York!!! Servizio rapido e Smoke Shack da leccarsi I baffi. Presente anche alternativa vegetariana (assaggiato da mia moglie e decisamente non male il fungo fritto)
The burgers here were really well prepared and tasted great - definitely a leg up on your typical fast food. The place itself was pretty clean and had good dine in seating options.
Five stars for the cheese fries. My favorite fries. However, the service is extremely slow. They move like they are in the island laid back  and relaxed. I waited 30 minutes for fast food.

Amazing burgers to try if you don't have a Shake Shack where you are from. If you go for the regular cheeseburger, I recommend adding bacon, you won't be disappointed. Fries are good and really crunchy. I went late at night and it wasn't busy and service was fairly fast.
